title: "table"

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(table1)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
nightingale <- read.delim(file = "data.txt", header = FALSE, row.names = NULL, sep = "\t", dec = ".")

nightingale
```

```{r}
names(nightingale) <- c("",
                        "",
                        "Zymotic Diseases",
                        "Wounds & Injuries",
                        "All Other Causes",
                        "Zymotic Diseases",
                        "Wounds & Injuries",
                        "All Other Causes")

nightingale
```

```{r}
kable(nightingale) %>%
  kable_styling("striped") %>%
  add_header_above(c("Months" = 1, "Average Size of Army" = 1, "Deaths" = 3, "Annual Rate of Mortality per 1000" = 3))

nightingale
```
